title: Diamond 4 mid/jungle player LFT
body:
hey guys and girls im currently diamond 4 and although idm solo q i really do enjoy playing ranked 5s a lot more  so im looking to join a semi serious team of people wanting to climb the ranked 5 ladder 

please be diamond+ players and thats about it   add me or msg me on here either is good

replies.body:
Hey man I am diamond 5, if you end up joining a team that needs another player to play i don't mind joining! I love to play ranked 5. 

My Ign: Seethingsin
